page.name: ICES Online Evaluation
page.content:
You are currently enrolled in one or more University of Illinois courses where the online Instructor and Course Evaluation System (ICES) is being used to conduct official end-of-semester evaluations.

Your ratings and comments are vital to helping your instructor improve the course and may be used in salary, promotion, and campus teaching award decisions. Your responses will be kept strictly confidential and anonymous, and your instructor will not receive results until the course is over and the term has ended.

Login to ICES Online (use your NetID and AD password).

Once you log in, follow the simple instructions to provide valuable feedback to your instructor. It only takes a few minutes.

Thank you for participating. If you have any questions about ICES Online, please consult the ICES Online web site or e-mail us at ices@illinois.edu.
